content:
# Timeblocks

## v1

```plain text
6:30 - 7:30 | Morning Routine
7:30 - 9:00 | Refine Dialect Blog
9:00 - 12:00 | Experiment with Dialect Outreach using Blog (answering StackOverflow questions)
12:00 - 12:45 | RV1 Meeting
12:45 - 17:30 | Coding up email template workflow (borrow code from Precommit) for sending to Dialect users
17:30 - 20:30 | Fix Dialect CI Test
20:30 - 22:30 | Start Creative Writing Course
22:30 - 23:30 | Evening Routine
```

## v2 (8:34)

```plain text
7:00 - 8:30 | Morning Routine
8:30 - 9:30 | Finish Hack the North application
9:30 - 10:30 | Refine Dialect Blog
10:30 - 12:00 | Experiment with Dialect Outreach using Blog (answering StackOverflow questions)
12:00 - 12:45 | RV1 Meeting
12:45 - 17:30 | Coding up email template workflow (borrow code from Precommit) for sending to Dialect users
17:30 - 20:30 | Fix Dialect CI Test
20:30 - 22:30 | Start Creative Writing Course
22:30 - 23:30 | Evening Routine
```

# Routines

## Morning

```plain text
6:30 - 6:45 | Wake up, brush teeth, bike to gym
6:45 - 7:15 | Gym
7:15 - 7:25 | Bike home
7:25 - 7:30 | Quick Shower
```

## Evening

```plain text
22:30 - 22:40 | Prepare gym bag & clothes for tomorrow, create next dayâ€™s daily timeblock; brush teeth
22:40 - 23:00 | Writing Practice
23:00 - 23:20 | Reading
23:20 - 23:30 | Sleep
```

# Time Distribution

**Activity**|**Time/day**|**Target Time/week**|**Time Spent Today**|**Time Spent This Week**
---|---|---|---|---

Morning Routine|1 hr/weekdays, 15 mins/weekends|5.5h (330 mins)|112 mins|112 mins
Gymnastics Gym|4 hrs/Friday|4h (240 mins)||
Evening Routine|1 hr/day|7h (420 mins)||
Weekly Vibe|1 hr/Sunday|1h (60 mins)||
Book Club|30 mins/3 days|1.5h (90 mins)||
Startup School||5h (300 mins)||
[Repl.it](http://Repl.it) Ventures||5h (300 mins)||
Dialect Outreach|Variable|50h (3000 mins)||
Dialect Coding|Variable|15h (900 mins)|395 mins|395 mins
SkillShare|90 mins/day|10.5h (630 mins)||
